home.presentation:
Welcome to my home page.
Born in Burundi, passionate about my job and other things ..
Feel free to surf on this application to discover my job, my passions and my projects ..
personalProject.description.jewe.na.bobo: This project is a philanthropic project for Burundi. I have always wondered how to participate in the economy of my homeland and finally why not to start with my family and my relatives who live there.
So I initialized this micro-investment project, which allows me to lend a little money according to the projects that my relatives present to me.
The goal is not to make a profit but to allow my relatives to invest in their projects and to reimburse me monthly until I recover the amount initially invested.
The application mainly allows to give visibility on the loans to myself and to the different people involved in the project.
To test the application, log in with the code name "test"and the password "123":
personalProject.description.ndiko.ndakli: This project is a philanthropic project for Burundi that I am very keen on that I am developing. You will know more soon.

hobbies.music.description: I'm an amator musician and have some written texts that I would like to produce.
hobbies.sport.description: My prefered sport is basketball. I do other sports as well: Crossfit, running, swimming, bicking, football and so on. I love this idea that says "to do every sport that you are given, is good for health."
hobbies.gardening.description: Since I saw the movie: "Demain" by Cyril Dion and MÃ©lanie Laurent, I think that agriculture is the key for the survival of the humanity. So I'm training my self and keep a garden at home.
